attributes.action: Strip 'Sir' Oliver Letwin of his title
attributes.additional_details: After running on a Conservative manifesto of respecting the vote of the Brexit referendum he has continually gone out of his way to thwart the will of the people at every turn.
attributes.background: His sheer dishonesty in trying to thwart the Brexit vote is unbecoming of a knight of the realm

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/having-honours-taken-away-forfeiture
